change.item: This finding aid was updated in alignment with LC EAD 2.0 specifications using a python script created by Erik Radio.

did.head: Collection Summary
did.abstract: Robert W. Chambers, 1865-1933, was an Artist and illustrator; author of romance fiction and military articles and sketches. The collection includes a holograph, 40-page manuscript, written in pencil, contains a fictional story about Civil War soldiers.

repository.label: Repository
repository.corpname: University of Arizona Libraries, Special Collections

accessrestrict.head: Restrictions
accessrestrict.p: There are no restrictions on this collection.

userestrict.head: Copyright

The user agrees to indemnify and hold harmless the Arizona Board of Regents for the University of Arizona, its officers, employees, and agents from and against all claims made by any person asserting that he or she is an owner of copyright.

prefercite.head: Credit Line
prefercite.p: An International Affair (MS 049). Special Collections, University of Arizona Libraries.

bioghist.head: Biographical Note
bioghist.p: Artist and illustrator; author of romance fiction and military articles and sketches.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Note
scopecontent.p: Holograph, 40-page manuscript, written in pencil, contains a fictional story about Civil War soldiers.

relatedmaterial.p: Published in Haunts of Men by Frederick A. Stokes Company, New York, 1898.
